title: Three Gaza hospitals face imminent closure as latest Israeli raids kill 50
description: UN warns that lack of fuel threatens to shut down more medical facilities across the besieged territory.

title: Behind Trump’s threat: Why is Greenland so strategically important?
description: The US president-elect does not rule out force to take over the Danish territory – home to a US military base.

title: Why are Donald Trump’s allies cheering for Pakistan’s Imran Khan?
description: From Richard Grenell to Matt Gaetz, their comments reflect overseas PTI campaigning for Khan’s release. Will it work?

title: Ukraine takes another bite out of Russia as Moscow’s offensive grinds on
description: Ukraine also announced significant investments in unmanned and long-range systems, where it has an edge.

title: Taliban calls India a ‘significant regional partner’ after officials meet
description: Senior foreign ministry officials of two countries hold highest-level talks since group’s takeover of Kabul in 2021.

title: Clashes in Mozambique as main opposition leader Mondlane returns from exile
description: One man reportedly killed in deadly clashes with police as Mondlane lands in Maputo months after disputed vote.

title: ‘For Ethiopia’s heritage’: War hero’s family fights to reclaim stolen medal
description: Medal Italian colonial soldiers stole from Prince Damtew resurfaces at auction 87 years after the war hero was executed.

title: Brazil’s Neymar says FIFA World Cup 2026 will be his last
description: Injury-prone forward wants to ‘work very hard’ to be with the Brazilian team at the next World Cup.

title: Syrians mark a month since al-Assad’s overthrow with concert in capital
description: Thousands attend the concert in Damascus to mark the end of al-Assad family rule and almost 14 years of civil war.

title: US withholds WADA dues; calls for reforms to global anti-doping watchdog
description: The move comes in the wake of WADA’s controversial handling of positive doping tests by Chinese swimmers.

title: Crowd crush at India’s Tirupati temple kills six as thousands seek entry
description: Dozens of others injured after thousands of devotees queue outside one of the most visited Hindu temples in south India.

title: Japanese crime boss admits to conspiring to sell nuclear material to Iran
description: Takeshi Ebisawa faces a maximum punishment of life in prison after pleading guilty to six counts in a Manhattan court.

title: Chad say military foiled armed assault on presidential complex, 19 killed
description: The attack came just hours after China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi met with government officials in the capital N’Djamena

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,050
description: Here are the key developments on the 1,050th day of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

title: Brazil marks the anniversary of the January 8 attack on its capital
description: President Lula attended the event to denounce the ‘coup’ against him, led by supporters of Jair Bolsonaro.

title: Barcelona defeat Athletic without Olmo to reach Spanish Super Cup final
description: Barcelona reach the final of the Spanish Super Cup with a 2-0 win against Athletic Bilbao in Saudi Arabia.

title: US Fed officials expected slower rate cuts in 2025, say December minutes
description: Minutes of the December meeting show a division on decision to cut rates and the 0.25 percent cut was ‘close call’.

title: ‘We must stand together’: European leaders warn Trump over Greenland threat
description: Trump’s refusal to rule out using military force, economic coercion to seize island causes disquiet, calls for unity.

title: Russian strike kills 13 in Ukraine’s Zaporizhzhia
description: The attack came hours after Ukraine’s military struck a depot deep inside Russia.

title: Industry groups sue over Biden ban on medical debt in credit reports
description: Consumer watchdog said new rule would lead to rising credit scores and an additional 22,000 low-cost mortgages annually.

title: Israeli attacks kill dozens in Gaza as ceasefire talks continue
description: Death toll rises as Gaza healthcare further collapses, deadly raids continue in occupied West Bank.

title: US Justice Department to release only part of Trump investigation report
description: It’s unlikely that the rest of the report, on the mishandling of classified documents, will be released under Trump.

title: Spain’s Sanchez says Musk incites hatred, warns against fascism in Europe
description: Billionaire businessman Elon Musk has raised alarm across Europe with a string of attacks on the continent’s leaders.

title: Wildfires, evacuations across California’s Los Angeles: What we know
description: With strong winds in California, the Palisades, Hurst and Eaton fires continue to blaze through Los Angeles.

title: Trump asks US Supreme Court to halt sentencing in New York hush-money case
description: US president-elect set to be sentenced in New York criminal case 10 days before beginning second term.

title: Ukraine says ready to replace Hungary in EU and NATO
description: Kyiv says it will fill in should Budapest elect to join Russian-led blocs instead.

title: Why has the US accused Sudanese militias of genocide – but not Israel?
description: The US says forces active within Sudan are guilty of many of the same war crimes that Israel is accused of.

title: Fakhar Zaman confident of returning for Pakistan at ICC Champions Trophy
description: The opener aims for comeback as the defending champions host their first ICC event in 29 years.

title: Italian journalist Cecilia Sala released from Iran jail, returns home
description: Tehran denies Sala’s December 19 detainment was linked to an Iranian businessman’s arrest in Italy on a US warrant.

title: Sudan’s military pushes back rebels in second city of Omdurman
description: Army takes control of RSF territories in Mansoura, Murabaat and Elfitihab, and seizes weapons and ammunition depot.

title: NATO, Gaza and Greenland: Key takeaways from Trump’s news conference
description: Trump’s grandstanding covered Ukraine joining NATO, Israel’s war on Gaza, and Greenland.

title: Five dead and thousands displaced as wildfires threaten Los Angeles area
description: More than 70,000 people have been forced to flee the flames as firefighters struggle to contain the wind-whipped blazes.

title: Thai police hunt hitman for shooting of Cambodian opposition figure
description: Bangkok police chief says initial investigation suggests a gunman was hired to carry out Tuesday’s shooting.

title: EU blasts Russia for weaponising gas in Moldova
description: Moscow blames Ukraine and Moldova for halting supplies; Chisinau suspects Russia seeks to influence upcoming election.

title: Russia gained 4,000sq km of Ukraine in 2024. How many soldiers did it lose?
description: Verifying casualty figures for soldier in the Russia-Ukraine war is difficult, as experts call it ‘a war of narratives’.

title: What is HMPV, the respiratory virus surging in China?
description: HMPV infections are spreading in China while cases of flu-like disease have also been found in India and the UK.

title: ‘Even Mo Salah would struggle for goals at Spurs’
description: Tottenham manager berates his team’s recent slump in form ahead of their League Cup semifinal against Liverpool.

title: Rebuilding Syria’s economy: Can stability return after war?
description: Syria’s new leadership faces an economy devastated by war and sanctions, with inflation and a decimated currency.

title: Turkiye threatens military action against Kurdish forces in Syria
description: Foreign Minister Fidan threatens military action against PKK-linked YPG group if they fail to meet Ankara’s demands.

title: Light aircraft crashes at tourist hotspot in Australia, killing 3
description: Authorities say they are investigating the cause of the crash off island located near Perth, Western Australia.

title: With Trump looming, Pakistan braces for foreign policy challenges in 2025
description: Analysts predict a tough year, as Islamabad prepares for more US belligerence towards China, the closest Pakistan ally.

title: Venezuela’s Maduro says US nationals among group of ‘mercenaries’ detained
description: President Maduro said the group included mercenaries and ‘hit men’, describing two US detainees as ‘very high level’.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,049
description: Here are the key developments on the 1,049th day of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

title: US bans medical debt from credit reports as Biden nears exit
description: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau says change will strike $49bn in medical debt from credit reports.

title: Former Cambodian opposition MP shot dead in Bangkok ‘assassination’
description: Lim Kimya, 74, had refused to flee Cambodia even after former PM Hun Sen threatened to make opposition MPs lives ‘hell’.

title: ‘Massacres’: Women, children killed as Israel bombs Gaza’s ‘safe zone’
description: Al Jazeera’s correspondent says fear dominates in Gaza as Israeli attacks intensify, targeting ‘humanitarian safe zone’.

title: Venezuelan opposition candidate claims son-in-law has been kidnapped
description: Edmundo Gonzalez, who competed against Nicolas Maduro in July elections, says masked men abducted son-in-law in Caracas.

title: ‘Hell will break out’: Trump hints at military moves in Mideast, Americas
description: Trump does not rule out US military force to retake Panama Canal, doubles down on Gaza threats in broad news conference.

title: US judge temporarily blocks release of Trump investigations report
description: Trump has denounced the investigations against him as politically motivated and the special counsel report as ‘fake’.

title: Lebanon approves extradition of Egyptian activist al-Qaradawi to UAE
description: Amnesty International warns Abdul Rahman al-Qaradawi could be at risk of human rights violations if extradited to UAE.

title: US says Sudan’s RSF committed genocide, announces sanctions on leaders
description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken says US committed to ‘holding accountable those responsible for these atrocities’.

title: Social media giant Meta scraps fact-checking for ‘community notes’
description: Meta, which owns Facebook and Instagram, says allowing fact-checkers to assess content ‘became a tool to censor’.

title: First international flight since al-Assad’s removal lands in Syria
description: Qatar Airways flight lands at Damascus International Airport, carrying nationals returning after years away.

title: US authorities seek to identify bodies found in JetBlue wheel well
description: Workers had found the bodies during a routine inspection after the flight landed in Florida from New York.

title: Danish PM says Greenland ‘not for sale’ as Donald Trump Jr visits island
description: Before his son’s ‘private’ visit, President-elect Donald Trump again says he wants Greenland to ‘become part of’ US.

title: John Mahama sworn in as Ghana’s president, promises to ‘reset’ the country
description: With around 20 African leaders in attendance, the 66-year-old is sworn in as Ghana’s president for third time.

title: Who will replace Trudeau as Canada’s Liberal party leader?
description: With Trudeau’s nine-year stint as prime minister ending, several politicians are frontrunners to take over his role.

title: French far-right leader Jean-Marie Le Pen dies aged 96
description: Co-founder of the National Front led the party for decades and was known for fiery rhetoric against immigration.

title: The secret to a balanced diet? Better roads, say scientists
description: A new study challenges the conventional wisdom that crop diversity alone addresses nutritional deficiencies.

title: Gang violence killed more than 5,600 people in Haiti in 2024: UN
description: Violent gangs control most of the Caribbean country’s capital, Port-au-Prince.

title: South Korean court extends arrest warrant for impeached Yoon
description: The impeached former president has refused questioning three times since his bungled December 3 martial law decree.

title: Israel extends closure of Al Jazeera office in occupied West Bank
description: The move follows a raid last September by Israeli forces that shut Al Jazeera’s Ramallah office for 45 days.

title: ‘We didn’t have anybody there’: Kyiv’s troops struggle as Russia advances
description: Ukrainian soldiers say Russia is waging fierce battles in the east while they attempt a renewed offensive in Kursk.

title: ‘It’s the only way’: Migrants, army face-off along S Africa-Zimbabwe border
description: South Africa’s military has enhanced border operations along the Limpopo River to halt smugglers and illegal crossings.

title: US diverting military funds from Egypt to Lebanon, report claims
description: The White House is to send $95m to Lebanon, citing regional security, while eyeing human rights concerns in Egypt.

title: Gaza aid effort at ‘breaking point’, warns UN
description: OCHA chief says attacks by Israeli troops and Palestinian groups stifling bid to save lives in war-torn enclave.

title: Deadly earthquake hits Tibet’s Shigatse: What we know so far
description: Search for survivors has ended after the magnitude 7.1 earthquake in Tibet killed at least 126 and wounded dozens.

title: US pauses select restrictions on Syria, offering hope on Western sanctions
description: Washington opens the way for some transactions in a move seen as an ‘important step’ towards easing sanctions.

title: Analysis: Turkiye’s road ahead in a post-Assad Syria
description: Challenges and opportunities await Ankara as its neighbour reimagines itself after decades of dictatorship.

title: Indonesia joins BRICS group of emerging economies
description: Indonesia joins Russia, China and others in the group, which is viewed as a counterweight to the West.

title: Three feared dead as mine accident traps workers in India’s Assam
description: Rescue operations still under way as nine others remain trapped in flooded Assam coal mine.

title: UK politicians urge England to boycott Afghanistan at Champions Trophy
description: In response, ECB proposes an ‘ICC-wide’ action against Afghanistan over the Taliban’s crackdown on women.

title: North Korea says test of new hypersonic missile successful
description: New intermediate-range hypersonic missile made with lighter materials making it more lethal, Pyongyang says.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,048
description: Here are the key developments on the 1,048th day of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

title: At least 126 killed as powerful earthquake hits Tibet
description: At least 188 injured as tremors also shook buildings in neighbouring Nepal, Bhutan and India.

title: US transfers 11 Yemeni detainees from Guantanamo Bay prison to Oman
description: Amnesty International welcomed the transfer but said Guantanamo would remain a ‘glaring, longstanding stain’ on the US.

title: Ex-New York Mayor and Trump ally Rudy Giuliani found in contempt of court
description: Giuliani has been under pressure to turn over assets to pay $148m to Georgia election workers he allegedly defamed.

title: US reports first death linked to bird flu in Louisiana
description: The late patient had been hospitalised in December with severe respiratory symptoms after contact with infected birds.

title: ‘Packing up our things’: January 6 prisoners prepare for Trump pardons
description: The fourth anniversary of the US Capitol riot was met with hope by those convicted for trying to overturn 2020 election.

title: US envoy says Israeli army will withdraw completely from south Lebanon
description: As Israel pulls out of western sector, Amos Hochstein promises full Israeli withdrawal with 60-day deadline looming.

title: US Congress certifies Donald Trump’s victory in 2024 presidential election
description: Quiet proceeding contrasts with efforts by Trump’s own supporters to overturn his 2020 loss by storming US Capitol.
